title: Voicemail icon 24/7?
content: My phone is literally displaying the icon in my notifications bar that I have a voicemail 24/7 even when there's no new voicemail and the voicemail box has been cleared out. How do I get this to only show up with a new voicemail? Verizon is useless with this matter. I've tried bringing it up with them multiple times and Everytime it ended with "don't know how to fix the issue"
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
